FontARA is not just a tool but a tribute to Saber Rastikerdar, a maestro of Persian typography who created fonts like Vazirmatn, Samim, and Shabnam. In honor of his legacy, transforming the 'Donate for Saber' button into a feature that showcases his work and impact would be a fitting memorial. This would not only celebrate Saber's contributions but also inspire and educate users about the richness of Persian font design
FontARA is a must-have extension for Persian users!
